item.title: Elevated API Errors
item.description:
Nov 21, 05:07 UTC
Resolved - The issue has now been resolved.

Nov 21, 05:03 UTC
Monitoring - Normal asset delivery has resumed, we'll continue monitor until the issue is resolved.

Nov 21, 04:27 UTC
Investigating - We are experiencing delays with delivering ETH to some US customers. We are investigating this issue and we will provide more updates in the next few hours.

item.title: MoonPay Support Portal unavailable
item.description:
Nov 19, 18:44 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 19, 18:35 UTC
Update - Resolved - All systems are operating normally.

Nov 19, 16:57 UTC
Identified - We've spotted that our support portal support.moonpay.com is unavailable/slow, we've identified there is an active issue with the vendor.
Thank you for your patience whilst this issue is being resolved

item.title: On and Offramp delivery of crypto assets are delayed
item.description:
Nov 18, 15:07 UTC
Resolved - All systems are operating normally.

Nov 18, 14:21 UTC
Update - We have detected and mitigated an issue affecting users' ability to log in to MoonPay. Transaction processing remains stable.

Nov 18, 12:20 UTC
Monitoring - We are seeing services recovering and withdrawals are now processing - we are actively monitoring the situation and will provide another update shortly.

Nov 18, 12:14 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 18, 11:59 UTC
Investigating - We are experiencing issues with some of MoonPay services. Following are impacted
* Inbound and OutBound transaction processing
* Some balances may be displayed incorrectly
* Some payment methods are impacted

We are actively investigating this and we will provide a new update as soon as possible.

item.title: Transaction processing is delayed
item.description:
Nov 14, 15:08 UTC
Resolved - Some transaction processing was delayed due to issues with a compliance provider. We are no longer seeing delays and all affected transactions have now been processed correctly.

Nov 14, 12:30 UTC
Identified - Due to a third party issue we are experiencing some delays in transaction processing. We are investigating this issue and we will provide more updates.

item.title: MoonPay App - Issues Sending Bitcoin
item.description:
Nov 13, 13:25 UTC
Resolved - The issue has been resolved.

Nov 13, 13:04 UTC
Investigating - We've spotted that something has gone wrong. We're currently investigating the issue, and will provide an update soon.

item.title: [MoonPay App] Issues with Bitcoin balances
item.description:
Nov 11, 11:06 UTC
Resolved - The issue has now been resolved.

Nov 11, 10:52 UTC
Identified - We are currently investigating an issue where some users may see incorrect or missing BTC balance information in their MoonPay accounts.

Please note that all funds are safe and on-chain balances remain unaffected â€” you can verify them directly via blockchain explorers.

Our team is working to identify the cause and restore accurate balance visibility as quickly as possible. We'll provide updates as soon as we have more information.

item.title: MoonPay App - Elevated failure rates on Convert
item.description:
Nov 10, 21:18 UTC
Resolved - It is no longer an issue.

Nov 10, 18:54 UTC
Investigating - We're investigating an issue with Convert failures on Solana.

item.title: Issues loading Balances on MoonPay app
item.description:
Nov 6, 14:55 UTC
Resolved - The issue has been fixed. Loading balances is now back to normal.

Nov 6, 14:15 UTC
Monitoring - The issue should now be fixed - all balances should load fine now. We'll keep monitoring the changes.

Nov 6, 14:12 UTC
Identified - We've spotted that something has gone wrong. We're currently investigating the issue, and will provide an update soon.

item.title: Notification & deep-link issues
item.description:
Nov 5, 12:12 UTC
Resolved - The issue is now resolved.

Customers using the MoonPay App on iOS are advised to update to the latest app version 2.0.26.

Nov 5, 08:53 UTC
Monitoring - We have identified and fixed the issue. We will continue to monitor any impact.

Customers are advised to update to the latest app version 2.0.26.

Nov 4, 19:29 UTC
Investigating - We've spotted that something has gone wrong with opening deep-links and notifications. We're currently investigating the issue, and will provide an update soon.

item.title: App freezes while buying tokens with a memo/tag
item.description:
Oct 31, 17:36 UTC
Resolved - The issue is now fixed ðŸŽƒ

Oct 31, 17:09 UTC
Identified - We detected the issue and are now deploying a fix.

Oct 31, 16:59 UTC
Investigating - We've spotted the App freezes when buying tokens that support a memo tag. We're currently investigating the issue, and will provide an update soon. You can use buy.moonpay.com in the meantime.

item.title: Sell Transaction Delays
item.description:
Oct 31, 15:20 UTC
Resolved - Transactions are completing as normal and any delayed transactions have been processed.

Oct 31, 15:09 UTC
Update - Sell transactions are starting to process again. We are monitoring and will update once full performance is confirmed.

Oct 31, 15:07 UTC
Monitoring - We've spotted that something has gone wrong. We're currently investigating the issue, and will provide an update soon.

Oct 31, 14:47 UTC
Identified - Due to an issue with a 3rd party provider we are experiencing some delays with sell transactions completing.

item.title: Issues with MoonPay App user balances
item.description:
Oct 27, 14:41 UTC
Resolved - The issue was identified and fixed.

Oct 27, 13:48 UTC
Identified - We are currently investigating an issue where some users may see incorrect or missing balance information in their MoonPay accounts.

Please note that all funds are safe and on-chain balances remain unaffected â€” you can verify them directly via blockchain explorers.

Our team is working to identify the cause and restore accurate balance visibility as quickly as possible. We'll provide updates as soon as we have more information.

item.title: MoonPay Balances US and ACH Maintenance
item.description:
Oct 26, 10:30 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 26, 05:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 23, 08:55 UTC
Scheduled - Our partner is doing a scheduled maintenance on Sunday, October 26th, from 2:00 AM to 6:00 AM ET. During this time, ACH payments and MoonPay Balances will be temporarily unavailable in the US, but you can still use any of our other payment methods. Thank you so much for your patience

item.title: Offramp delivery is delayed
item.description:
Oct 25, 22:54 UTC
Resolved - Processing has resumed and queued payouts are being delivered.

Oct 25, 20:32 UTC
Monitoring - Weâ€™re experiencing delays for some off-ramp (sell) payouts due to an unexpected extension of a partnerâ€™s scheduled maintenance window. Weâ€™re monitoring closely and will process pending payouts as soon as service is restored.

Oct 25, 19:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

item.title: MoonPay App Balances Incorrect
item.description:
Oct 22, 11:12 UTC
Resolved - The issue causing some users to see incorrect or missing balances has been resolved.

All balances are now displaying correctly in MoonPay. Throughout this incident, funds remained secure and were always accurately reflected on-chain.

Thank you for your patience.

Oct 22, 11:07 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where some users may see incorrect or missing balance information in their MoonPay accounts.

Please note that all funds are safe and on-chain balances remain unaffected â€” you can verify them directly via blockchain explorers.

Our team is working to identify the cause and restore accurate balance visibility as quickly as possible. Weâ€™ll provide updates as soon as we have more information.

item.title: Issues affecting login to MoonPay
item.description:
Oct 22, 01:48 UTC
Resolved - This issue is now resolved.

Oct 22, 01:33 UTC
Identified - We're resolving an issue affecting the ability to log into Moonpay

item.title: BTC Balances are not loading on the app
item.description:
Oct 20, 22:03 UTC
Resolved - BTC balances displaying on the app have been restored.

Oct 20, 21:35 UTC
Identified - We've spotted that something has gone wrong. We're currently investigating the issue while working with our balances provider, and will provide an update soon.

item.title: Some features may be unavailable or degraded
item.description:
Oct 20, 13:30 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 20, 10:02 UTC
Monitoring - We are seeing recovery from our third party providers and service is mostly restored. Functionalities which require phone number validation might experience difficulties. We'll keep monitoring.

Oct 20, 09:42 UTC
Update - We are investigating an incident affecting one or more third-party providers, resulting in intermittent errors and elevated latency across parts of our platform. Some features may be unavailable or degraded, including document verification, card payments, and crypto delivery for select currencies. We are working with the impacted providers to mitigate the issue and will share updates as we learn more.

Oct 20, 07:54 UTC
Identified - We're aware of customers facing an issue of not being able to complete a transaction using cards. We're investigating the issue.

item.title: Processing of some transactions is delayed
item.description:
Oct 17, 16:04 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 17, 15:43 UTC
Monitoring - The issue has been resolved. We're actively monitoring the situation to confirm continued stability.

Oct 17, 12:08 UTC
Identified - Some transactions are currently facing a delay. We've identified the problem and are currently working on resolving the issue.

item.title: Issue displaying Tron balances
item.description:
Oct 14, 10:43 UTC
Resolved - We fixed the issue and Tron balances are now visible for all users. Thank you for your patience and sorry for the inconvenience.

Oct 14, 08:18 UTC
Update - Some of our users can't see their Tron wallet's balance. This is caused by an issue with one of our providers that affects a subset of our users.

We're still waiting for our provider to fix the issue. Yesterday was a holiday in their location so today we're hoping for a resolution. In the meantime, you can use Tronscan to view your Tron balance correctly.

Oct 13, 12:45 UTC
Identified - Some of our users can't see their Tron wallet's balance. This is caused by an issue with one of our providers that affects a subset of our users.

We're collaborating with our provider to fix the issue as soon as possible, and we'll provide an update soon. In the meantime, you can use any Tron explorer (like Tronscan) to view your Tron balance correctly.

item.title: Onramp delivery of some crypto assets is delayed
item.description:
Oct 11, 15:48 UTC
Resolved - We've spotted that something has gone wrong. We're currently investigating the issue, and will provide an update soon.

Oct 11, 14:36 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating issue with delayed orders for BTC and ETH and we will provide more updates shortly.

item.title: Onramp delivery of some crypto assets is delayed
item.description:
Oct 11, 00:15 UTC
Resolved - The orders were stuck due to big spike in network fees, all of the stuck orders are now gone through

Oct 10, 22:09 UTC
Investigating - We are seeing delays in delivering Ethereum transactions. Our team is monitoring this and we will provide update as soon as possible.

item.title: MoonTag Request flow limited availability
item.description:
Oct 10, 17:56 UTC
Resolved - We think the impact from the issue is over.

Oct 10, 17:38 UTC
Monitoring - We've rolled out a fix. We're currently monitoring the issue, and will provide an update soon.

Oct 10, 16:47 UTC
Update - We've spotted that something has gone wrong with MoonTag Request. We're currently investigating the issue, and will provide an update soon.

Oct 10, 16:43 UTC
Identified - We've spotted that something has gone wrong with MoonTag Request flow. We're have identified it is related to flow property using fixed-rate as the value when fetching pair limits on swaps.xyz v1.
